# Context

This section aims to explain in detail what the function `hectimetables::class_optim()` does and how it should be used for future developers who would like to get inspired for their own projects. 

# Parameters

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ptds2021/project--G2")

library("hectimetables")

hectimetables::class_optim(s, 
                           f.obj, 
                           f.con, 
                           f.dir, 
                           credits, 
                           core, 
                           elective, 
                           moment, 
                           class)
```
